COLD.DESCRIPTION: A #yCool enemy deals 15% less damage with Attacks. If a #yCool enemy becomes #yHot, remove it, it loses triple its #yCool amount in HP, and apply #yThermal #yShock for 1 turn.

CORPOREAL.DESCRIPTION: A Corporeal card is any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

FLOW.DESCRIPTION: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

Heat.DESCRIPTION: A #yHot enemy takes 30% increased damage from Attacks. If a #yHot enemy becomes #yCool, remove it, it loses triple its #yHot amount in HP, and apply #yThermal #yShock for 1 turn.

MUTABLE.DESCRIPTION: When a card is #yTransmuted, any #yMutable effect is passed on to the next card for the rest of Combat.

PURITY.DESCRIPTION: Cards grow stronger through the #yTransmutation process. #yBlock gain and damage dealt are increased this combat.

SWAPPABLE.DESCRIPTION: A Swappable card is #yPaired with another card and, while selected, can be freely #ySwapped between the two by pressing #b

TRANSMUTE.DESCRIPTION: Transforms a card in combat into any card of the same rarity available to your current run. The new card is stronger than usual. This effect stacks.

THERMAL_SHOCK.DESCRIPTION: A Shocked enemy counts as both #yHot and #yCool. Applying any #yCold or #yHeat to this enemy will instead increase this duration by 1 turn.
